mapper.select: SELECT Distinct1.TRX_ID TRX_ID , Distinct1.PAY_MODE_ID PAY_MODE_ID , Distinct1.IS_ONLINE IS_ONLINE , Distinct1.ORI_CC_NO ORI_CC_NO , Distinct1.CC_HOLDER_NAME CC_HOLDER_NAME , Distinct1.CC_EXPR CC_EXPR , Distinct1.BANK_ID BANK_ID , Distinct1.APPV_NO APPV_NO , Distinct1.MID MID , Distinct1.BRNCH_ID BRNCH_ID , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_ID PAY_ITM_ID , Distinct1.PAY_ID PAY_ID , Distinct1.OR_NO OR_NO , Distinct1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Distinct1.C1 C1 , Distinct1.TYPE_ID TYPE_ID , Distinct1.C3 C3 , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_AMT PAY_ITM_AMT , Distinct1.CC_TYPE_ID CC_TYPE_ID , Distinct1.REF_DT REF_DT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT Extent1.TRX_ID TRX_ID , Extent1.PAY_MODE_ID PAY_MODE_ID , Extent1.IS_ONLINE IS_ONLINE , Extent1.ORI_CC_NO ORI_CC_NO , Extent1.CC_HOLDER_NAME CC_HOLDER_NAME , Extent1.CC_EXPR CC_EXPR , Extent1.BANK_ID BANK_ID , Extent1.APPV_NO APPV_NO , Extent1.MID MID , Extent1.BRNCH_ID BRNCH_ID , Extent3.PAY_ITM_ID PAY_ITM_ID , Extent3.PAY_ID PAY_ID , Extent4.OR_NO OR_NO , Extent5.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , 1 C1 , CASE WHEN ( Extent4.TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent4.TYPE_ID ELSE 0 END TYPE_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent6.SALES_ORD_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent6.SALES_ORD_NO WHEN ( Extent8.SALES_ORD_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent8.SALES_ORD_NO ELSE Extent9.MEM_CODE END C3 , CASE WHEN ( Extent3.PAY_ITM_AMT IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent3.PAY_ITM_AMT ELSE UTILS.CONVERT_TO_FLOAT(0,53) END PAY_ITM_AMT , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.CC_TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.CC_TYPE_ID ELSE 0 END CC_TYPE_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.REF_DT IS NOT NULL ) THEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(Extent1.REF_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD') || ' 00:00:00', 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE TO_DATE('1900-01-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END REF_DT FROM PAY0097D Extent1 JOIN PAY0098M Extent2 ON ( Extent2.ITM_ID = Extent1.ITM_ID ) AND ( 1 = Extent2.STUS_ID ) JOIN PAY0065D Extent3 ON Extent3.PAY_ITM_ID = Extent2.PAY_ITM_ID JOIN PAY0064D Extent4 ON Extent4.PAY_ID = Extent3.PAY_ID JOIN SYS0013M Extent5 ON Extent5.CODE_ID = Extent4.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D Extent6 ON ( Extent6.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent4.SALES_ORD_ID ) AND ( Extent4.SALES_ORD_ID > 0 ) LEFT JOIN PAY0007D Extent7 ON ( Extent7.BILL_ID = Extent4.BILL_ID ) AND ( Extent4.BILL_ID > 0 ) LEFT JOIN SAL0001D Extent8 ON ( Extent8.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent7.BILL_SO_ID ) AND ( Extent7.BILL_SO_ID > 0 ) LEFT JOIN ORG0001D Extent9 ON ( Extent9.MEM_ID = Extent7.BILL_MEM_ID ) AND ( Extent7.BILL_MEM_ID > 0 ) WHERE Extent1.ITM_ID = #{payItemId} ) Distinct1 ORDER BY Distinct1.PAY_ITM_ID ASC

SELECT Extent1.LOG_ID LOG_ID , Extent1.ITM_ID ITM_ID , CASE WHEN(Extent1.REM IS NOT NULL) THEN Extent1.REM ELSE ' ' END REM, TO_CHAR(Extent1.CRT_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH:MI AM') CRT_DT , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.USER_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.USER_NAME ELSE ' ' END USER_NAME FROM PAY0171D Extent1 LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent2 ON Extent2.USER_ID = Extent1.CRT_USER_ID WHERE Extent1.ITM_ID = #{payItemId} ORDER BY Extent1.LOG_ID ASC

SELECT Extent1.BATCH_ID BATCH_ID , Extent1.BATCH_NO BATCH_NO , Extent1.BATCH_STUS_ID BATCH_STUS_ID , Extent1.BATCH_RESULT_STUS_ID BATCH_RESULT_STUS_ID , Extent1.BATCH_PAY_MODE_ID BATCH_PAY_MODE_ID , Extent1.BATCH_PAY_IS_ONLINE BATCH_PAY_IS_ONLINE , Extent1.BATCH_TOT_ITM BATCH_TOT_ITM , Extent1.BATCH_TOT_CMPLT BATCH_TOT_CMPLT , Extent1.BATCH_TOT_INCMPT BATCH_TOT_INCMPT , Extent1.BATCH_TOT_PENDING BATCH_TOT_PENDING , TO_CHAR(Extent1.CRT_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY') CRT_DT , Extent1.CRT_USER_ID CRT_USER_ID , TO_CHAR(Extent1.UPD_DT, 'DD-MM-YYYY') UPD_DT , Extent1.UPD_USER_ID UPD_USER_ID , Extent1.BATCH_TOT_REVIW BATCH_TOT_REVIW , Extent1.BATCH_TOT_NW BATCH_TOT_NW , Extent1.BATCH_TOT_RESEND BATCH_TOT_RESEND , Extent2.NAME NAME , Extent3.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , CASE WHEN ( Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent4.NAME ELSE ' ' END STUS_CODE_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent5.USER_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent5.USER_NAME ELSE ' ' END CREATORNAME , CASE WHEN ( Extent6.USER_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent6.USER_NAME ELSE ' ' END UPD_USER_ID_NAME FROM PAY0170M Extent1 JOIN SYS0038M Extent2 ON Extent2.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.BATCH_STUS_ID JOIN SYS0013M Extent3 ON Extent3.CODE_ID = Extent1.BATCH_PAY_MODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M Extent4 ON Extent4.STUS_CODE_ID = Extent1.BATCH_RESULT_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent5 ON Extent5.USER_ID = Extent1.CRT_USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M Extent6 ON Extent6.USER_ID = Extent1.UPD_USER_ID WHERE Extent1.BATCH_ID = #{batchId} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT Distinct1.OR_NO OR_NO , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_ID PAY_ITM_ID , Distinct1.PAY_ID PAY_ID , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_REF_DT PAY_ITM_REF_DT , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO PAY_ITM_APPV_NO , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_MID PAY_ITM_MID , Distinct1.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , Distinct1.C9 C9 , Distinct1.TYPE_ID TYPE_ID , Distinct1.ORDERNOMEMBERCODE C3 , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_AMT PAY_ITM_AMT , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID , Distinct1.BRNCH_ID BRNCH_ID , Distinct1.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID PAY_ITM_MODE_ID , Distinct1.TRX_ID TRX_ID FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT Extent1.OR_NO OR_NO , Extent2.PAY_ITM_ID PAY_ITM_ID , Extent2.PAY_ID PAY_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE ELSE TO_NUMBER(0) END PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO ELSE ' ' END PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID ELSE 0 END PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME ELSE ' ' END PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT ELSE ' ' END PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_REF_DT IS NOT NULL ) THEN TO_CHAR(Extent2.PAY_ITM_REF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE '1900-01-01 00:00:00' END PAY_ITM_REF_DT , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO ELSE ' ' END PAY_ITM_APPV_NO , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_MID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_MID ELSE ' ' END PAY_ITM_MID , Extent3.CODE_NAME CODE_NAME , 1 C9 , CASE WHEN ( Extent1.TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.TYPE_ID ELSE 0 END TYPE_ID , CASE WHEN ( Extent4.SALES_ORD_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent4.SALES_ORD_NO WHEN ( Extent6.SALES_ORD_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent6.SALES_ORD_NO ELSE Extent7.MEM_CODE END ORDERNOMEMBERCODE , CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_AMT IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_AMT ELSE TO_NUMBER(0) END PAY_ITM_AMT , CASE WHEN ( CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID ELSE 0 END IS NOT NULL ) THEN CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID , CASE WHEN ( CASE WHEN ( Extent1.BRNCH_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.BRNCH_ID ELSE 0 END IS NOT NULL ) THEN CASE WHEN ( Extent1.BRNCH_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.BRNCH_ID ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END BRNCH_ID , CASE WHEN ( CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID ELSE 0 END IS NOT NULL ) THEN CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END PAY_ITM_MODE_ID , CASE WHEN ( CASE WHEN ( Extent1.TRX_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.TRX_ID ELSE 0 END IS NOT NULL ) THEN CASE WHEN ( Extent1.TRX_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.TRX_ID ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END TRX_ID FROM PAY0064D Extent1 JOIN PAY0065D Extent2 ON ( Extent1.PAY_ID = Extent2.PAY_ID ) AND ( Extent2.PAY_ID = Extent1.PAY_ID ) JOIN SYS0013M Extent3 ON Extent1.TYPE_ID = Extent3.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D Extent4 ON ( Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID = Extent4.SALES_ORD_ID ) AND ( Extent1.SALES_ORD_ID > 0 ) LEFT JOIN PAY0007D Extent5 ON ( Extent1.BILL_ID = Extent5.BILL_ID ) AND ( Extent1.BILL_ID > 0 ) LEFT JOIN SAL0001D Extent6 ON ( Extent5.BILL_SO_ID = Extent6.SALES_ORD_ID ) AND ( Extent5.BILL_SO_ID > 0 ) LEFT JOIN ORG0001D Extent7 ON ( Extent5.BILL_MEM_ID = Extent7.MEM_ID ) AND ( Extent5.BILL_MEM_ID > 0 ) WHERE 1=1 AND ( Extent1.TRX_ID = #{trxId} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID ELSE 0 END) = #{payModeId} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE ELSE TO_NUMBER(0) END) = #{isOnline} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO ELSE ' ' END) = #{oriCcNo} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID ELSE 0 END) = #{ccTypeId} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME ELSE ' ' END) = #{ccHolderName} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT ELSE ' ' END) = #{ccExpr} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID ELSE 0 END) = #{bankId} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_REF_DT IS NOT NULL ) THEN TO_CHAR(Extent2.PAY_ITM_REF_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ELSE '1900-01-01 00:00:00' END) = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{refDt}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' 00:00:00') AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO ELSE ' ' END) = #{appvNo}) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_MID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_MID ELSE ' ' END) = #{mid} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent1.BRNCH_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent1.BRNCH_ID ELSE 0 END) = #{brnchId} ) AND ( (CASE WHEN ( Extent2.PAY_ITM_REF_NO IS NOT NULL ) THEN Extent2.PAY_ITM_REF_NO ELSE ' ' END) = #{refNo} ) ) Distinct1 ORDER BY Distinct1.PAY_ITM_ID ASC
